name: Grand Canyon
description: A steep-sided canyon carved by the Colorado River in Arizona

name: Niagara Falls
description: A group of three waterfalls located on the border of the United States and Canada.

name: Stonehenge
description: A prehistoric monument consisting of a ring of standing stones in Wiltshire

name: Christ the Redeemer
description: A statue of Jesus Christ in Rio de Janeiro

name: Acropolis of Athens
description: An ancient citadel located on a rocky outcrop above the city of Athens

name: Angkor Wat
description: A temple complex in Cambodia and the largest religious monument in the world.

name: Big Ben
description: The nickname for the Great Bell of the clock at the north end of the Palace of Westminster in London

description: A volcanic archipelago in the Pacific Ocean
